name: Find the cat (Low effort Jam 4)
description:
How quickly did you find the cat? Let me know your best times!

My submission for the low effort game jam 4.
A relaxing little project which was about an hours worth of work all together! What a comfy / fun jam, looking forward to the next one!

Pro tip: click on the cat and not the bunny, dog, or bear (unless you want to, that's okay too)!
